title: This Week in Tech: A Gold Specialized Tarmac, Park Tool’s Free 3D-Printed Tool Holders, and Maap Launches New Collaboration
content:
Slug Bicycles drops a new titanium gravel bike with 57 mm clearance, Gore has a limited edition jacket, Wahoo's new computers are officially on sale, and more tech this week.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: A Gold Specialized Tarmac, Park Tool’s Free 3D-Printed Tool Holders, and Maap Launches New Collaboration on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
